info.title: Care
info.text: For daily cleaning, use a soft cloth dampened with clean water. Avoid any chemical cleaners. After wiping down the furniture, thoroughly dry the wood with a soft cloth to prevent streaks and scratches.

info.title: Shipping and returns
info.text: Please allow approximately 6-10 weeks for your made-to-order items to be built. shipping time and cost will vary depending on item size, weight, and destination.
